channel.title: Receiving MIDI CC on selected channel
channel.description: Hello, I'd like to have several objects each one listening to a different MIDI CC input and each one with a ditferent MIDI channel. Can't find this. The MID/in/cc is listening to all channel, is there a way to add a channel selection? Thanks

item.title: Receiving MIDI CC on selected channel
item.dc:creator: @toneburst alx
item.description:
@toneburst wrote:

It's also relatively easy to add a MIDI channel selector to the factory keyb object, if you fancy digging into the object code.

a|x

Read full topic
item.source: Receiving MIDI CC on selected channel

item.title: Receiving MIDI CC on selected channel
item.dc:creator: @lokki
item.description:
@lokki wrote:

create a subpatch and set it so it has a midi selector, you can then choose your midi channel from the top patch.

Read full topic
item.source: Receiving MIDI CC on selected channel
